Properties.ProtectedString:
Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = true
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

local Tool = script.Parent local Wand = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local myTorso local myHumanoid
Tool.Enabled = true
local castSound
local wandAnim
function onActivated() if Tool.Enabled == false then return end
vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
if myTorso == nil or myHumanoid == nil then return end
Tool.Enabled = false
wandAnim = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.WandAnim) if wandAnim then wandAnim:Play() end
castSound = Wand:FindFirstChild("CastSound") if castSound then castSound:Play() end
local activateSpell = Tool:FindFirstChild("ActivateSpell") if activateSpell and activateSpell.Value == 0 then activateSpell.Value = 1 end
wait(3.0) Tool.Enabled = true end
function onEquipped() vCharacter = Tool.Parent end
function onUnequipped() if wandAnim then wandAnim:Stop() end if castSound then castSound:Stop() end end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)

local Tool = script.Parent local Wand = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local myTorso local myHumanoid local vPlayer
local box = Instance.new("Part") box.FormFactor = 3 box.CanCollide = true --box.Size = Vector3.new(5, 3, 6.5) box.Size = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1)
local boxMesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") boxMesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=62744344" boxMesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=62744255" boxMesh.Parent = box boxMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(0.8, 0.8, 0.8)
local door = Instance.new("Part") door.FormFactor = 3 door.CanCollide = true --door.Size = Vector3.new(1, 5.5, 6.5) door.Size = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1)
local screamSound
local doorMesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") doorMesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=62722732" doorMesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=62744255" doorMesh.Parent = door doorMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(0.8, 0.8, 0.8)
local ball = Instance.new("Part") ball.FormFactor = 3 ball.Shape = "Block" ball.Size = Vector3.new(0.4, 0.4, 0.4) ball.CanCollide = false ball.Transparency = 0.8
local mesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") mesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=57810032" mesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=57809568" mesh.Parent = ball mesh.Scale = Vector3.new(2, 2, 2)
local sparkls = Instance.new("Sparkles") sparkls.Parent = ball sparkls.SparkleColor = Color3.new(165/255, 0, 33/255)
local activateSpell = Tool:FindFirstChild("ActivateSpell")
local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
while activateSpell == nil do wait() activateSpell = Tool:FindFirstChild("ActivateSpell") end function tagHumanoid(humanoid, player) if humanoid ~= nil then creatorTag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creatorTag.Name = "creator" creatorTag.Parent = humanoid creatorTag.Value = player debris:AddItem(creatorTag, 1.5) end end
function pierce(missile, hit) if missile then if hit.Parent and hit then if hit.className == "Hat" then humanoid = hit.Parent.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") else humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") end if humanoid ~= nil and myHumanoid ~= humanoid and myHumanoid ~= nil then tagHumanoid(humanoid, vPlayer) humanoid:TakeDamage(30) end end end end
function fire(direction) vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) if vPlayer == nil then return end
local spawnPos = Wand.Position + direction * 3.0
local missile = ball:Clone() missile.CFrame = CFrame.new(spawnPos, spawnPos + direction) missile.Velocity = direction * 90.0 missile.RotVelocity = Vector3.new(0, 10, 0)
local floatForce = Instance.new("BodyForce") floatForce.force = Vector3.new(0, missile:GetMass() * 196.1, 0) floatForce.Parent = missile
missile.Parent = game.Workspace
missile.Touched:connect(function(hit) pierce(missile, hit) end)
debris:AddItem(missile, 5) end
function smack(humanoid, weld, box, door, head) wait(1.0) if weld then local initC1 = weld.C1 for i = 1, 20 do weld.C1 = initC1 * CFrame.Angles(0, 0, -math.pi/40 * i) + Vector3.new(-1/20 * i, 1/6.5 * i, 0) wait() end end wait() screamSound = Wand:FindFirstChild("ScreamSound") if screamSound then screamSound:Play() end if humanoid then humanoid:TakeDamage(55) humanoid.WalkSpeed = 16.0 end if head then head.Anchored = false end wait(1.0) if box then box:Remove() end if door then door:Remove() end end
function doom() local foundPlayer = false activateSpell = Tool:FindFirstChild("ActivateSpell") if activateSpell and activateSpell.Value == 1 then if myTorso and myHumanoid then local players = game.Players:GetChildren() for i = 1, #players do if players[i] and players[i] ~= vPlayer and players[i].Character and players[i].Character:FindFirstChild("Torso") and players[i].Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") then local torso = players[i].Character.Torso local head = players[i].Character.Head local humanoid = players[i].Character.Humanoid local distance = (torso.Position - myTorso.Position).magnitude if distance < 40 then foundPlayer = true humanoid.WalkSpeed = 0.0 local boxClone = box:Clone() boxClone.Parent = game.Workspace boxClone.CFrame = torso.CFrame boxClone.Name = "Box"
local boxWeld = Instance.new("Weld") boxWeld.Part0 = torso boxWeld.Part1 = boxClone boxWeld.Parent = boxClone boxWeld.C1 = CFrame.new(0, 0, 0.2) * CFrame.Angles(math.pi/2, 0, 0) boxWeld.Name = "BoxWeld"
local doorClone = door:Clone() doorClone.Parent = boxClone doorClone.Name = "Door"
local doorWeld = Instance.new("Weld") doorWeld.Part0 = boxClone doorWeld.Part1 = doorClone doorWeld.Parent = doorClone doorWeld.C1 = CFrame.new(Vector3.new(1.5, -3, -1.8)) doorWeld.C1 = doorWeld.C1 * CFrame.Angles(0, math.pi, 0) doorWeld.C1 = doorWeld.C1 + Vector3.new(0, 0, 1.8) doorWeld.Name = "DoorWeld"
head.Anchored = true
coroutine.resume(coroutine.create(function() smack(humanoid, doorWeld, boxClone, doorClone, head) end)) end end if foundPlayer == true then wait(10.0) else fire((myHumanoid.TargetPoint - Wand.Position).unit) wait(3.0) end end end
activateSpell.Value = 0 end end
function onEquipped() vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) end
function onUnequipped() if screamSound then screamSound:Stop() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped)
activateSpell.Changed:connect(doom)
